name: grid
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: grid
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a pattern or structure made from horizontal and vertical lines crossing each other to form squares

example.eg: A metal grid had been placed over the hole to prevent people from falling in.
example.egtrans: 在洞口铺了一个铁格栅，以免有人跌入。

example.eg: In Barcelona the streets are laid out in/on a grid system.
example.egtrans: 巴塞罗那的街道是棋盘式的布局。

dsense.name: grid
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a system of wires through which electricity is connected to different power stations across a region

dsense.name: grid
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a pattern of squares with numbers or letters used to find places on a map

dsense.name: grid
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a pattern of lines marking the start of the track in motor racing (= a sport of racing very fast and powerful cars around a track)

example.eg: In all, 26 drivers will be on the starting grid tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 明天总共有 26 名车手将在起跑线上。
